titles.title: Investment Tax Incentive Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the deduction for depreciation shall be computed on a neutral cost recovery basis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7237-7238)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/15/1993--Introduced. Investment Tax Incentive Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the depreciation deduction to be computed based on a neutral recovery basis for property placed in service after December 31, 1992. Repeals the special depreciation rules applicable under the adjusted current earnings provisions of the minimum tax.
